title: Taken by my Gay Rose Bush 2: Hosta Have Him
description: Drew has bought a new house, and now he is struggling to come to terms with his submission to the psychic, sentient rose bush in his garden, Charles. After a tough day at work, he decides to go home and show Charles that he is the dominant one in this relationship.  Charles and the other plants in the garden disagree.  This steaming hot plant-on-man story of 4400 words contains masturbation, bondage, oral, anal, rim jobs, nipple clamps, and a pumpkin with a booty that just won't quit.
author: Flint Ramrod
